Package model

Interface StockCompositionData

  • All Superinterfaces:
    StockPortFolioData
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StockCompositionDataImpl
    public interface StockCompositionData
extends StockPortFolioData
    This interface represents the portfolio and the data available in the portfolio.

      • getNumberOfPortFolio

        int getNumberOfPortFolio()
        A method that tells the number of portfolio's that are available for the user.
        Returns:
        the number of portfolio's

      • getNumberOfTransactionsInAPortFolio

        int getNumberOfTransactionsInAPortFolio​(java.lang.String filename)
        A helper method that helps to find out the number of stocks that are present in a portfolio.
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename of the portfolio
        Returns:
        the number of stocks as an integer

      • getPortFolioNames

        java.lang.String[] getPortFolioNames​(java.lang.String portfolioType)
        This method finds out the names of all the portfolio that a user has in the system.
        Returns:
        the names of the portfolio as a string array

      • getAllStockDataInPortFolio

        StockPortFolioData getAllStockDataInPortFolio​(int index,
                                              boolean unique,
                                              java.lang.String dateStr,
                                              boolean includeSale,
                                              boolean realValue,
                                              java.lang.String portfolioType)
        This method gets all the stock related data that is in a portfolio and some data relevant to the portfolio.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the portfolio
        unique - true if the stocks bought of different dates should be obtained uniquely
        dateStr - date until which the stock data is required
        includeSale - true if the data needs to have the stocks that are sold as well
        realValue - true to ignore the data of those stocks with zero shares
        Returns:
        the object of stock portfolio data class

      • sharesAvailableOnTheDateForSale

        int sharesAvailableOnTheDateForSale​(int pfIndex,
                                    java.lang.String stockSymbol,
                                    java.lang.String dateStr,
                                    java.lang.String portfolioType)
                             throws java.text.ParseException
        This method gets all the stocks on a particular date that are available for sale.
        Parameters:
        pfIndex - the index of the portfolio
        stockSymbol - symbol of the stock
        dateStr - data on which the stock data needs to be obtained
        Returns:
        the number of shares available as an integer
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - if error while parsing the csv data

      • computePerformanceData

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double> computePerformanceData​(java.lang.String[] args,
                                                                              int length,
                                                                              java.lang.String portfolioType)
                                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        This method obtains the complete performance data of the portfolio on the given date.
        Parameters:
        args - the arguments required for computing the portfolio performance
        length - the length of the arguments
        Returns:
        the map of the date and value of the portfolio on that date
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error in IO operation

        portfolioType - type of portfolio
